Bug report template

=User information=

* OS (iOS / Android):

* Chai App Version:

* Login Type:

* Bot Name(Optional)

* UserID(Optional / please note this helps devs fix issues much faster)

* Frequency of occurance: 

* Expected behavior:

* Actual behavior: 


* Additional Information:


=Provide Screenshots if possible=
